full_description:
Seagate BarraCuda 570 250GB Gen4 M.2 2280 PCIe NVMe SSD

The Seagate BarraCuda 570 250GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD is a high-capacity storage option built for speed. With a storage size of 250GB, this SSD provides enough room for varied data, apps, and multimedia files, making it suitable for both regular users and enthusiasts. It has a PCIe Gen4 4 NVMe 1.4 interface and uses cutting-edge technology to enable fast data transfer rates and overall performance. The M.2 2280-S2 form factor assures a small design, allowing it to be integrated into a variety of devices such as ultrabooks, gaming laptops, and desktop systems. With read speeds of up to 3200MB/s and write rates of up to 1300MB/s, this SSD enables speedier boot times, faster application loading, and efficient data transfers, resulting in an improved computing experience. Whether you're a gamer, a content producer, or simply want to update your system's storage, the Seagate BarraCuda 570 provides a fantastic blend of capacity, speed, and reliability, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking for top-tier performance from their storage solution.

cat_seo_title: Seagate SSD Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech

full_description:
Seagate FireCuda 530 500GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Gaming SSD

The Seagate FireCuda 530 500GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Gaming SSD allows you to immerse yourself in unparalleled gaming and video creative experiences. This M.2 2280 SSD features a massive 500GB of storage driven by 3D TLC NAND NVMe technology, plenty of room for graphics-intensive games, and massive file libraries. Its remarkable performance is highlighted by mind-boggling read and write speeds of up to 7000 and 3000 MB/s, respectively, enabled by a cutting-edge PCIe 4.0 x4 interface. PCIe 3.0 backward compatibility guarantees compatibility with a wide range of motherboards, but at somewhat decreased speeds. The FireCuda 530, designed for the demands of pro-level gaming and video production, outperforms expectations with speeds twice as fast as PCIe 3.0 NVMe SSDs and an amazing twelve times faster than traditional SATA SSDs. The drive's tough design, which is supported by a Seagate-validated E18 controller and 3D TLC NAND memory, allows it to withstand severe use, pushing the limits of your computer without sacrificing longevity. The FireCuda 530 has a remarkable Total Bytes Written (TBW) value of 640, ensuring dependability under heavy workloads. This amounts to the ability to write and erase 70% of the drive capacity every day for a staggering five years, demonstrating its durability. The large 500GB storage space handles graphics-intensive games and large data with ease, offering a smooth and fast computing experience. As an extra layer of protection, the FireCuda 530 has a three-year Rescue Data Recovery Services package with a 95% success record against unexpected data loss. It should be noted that the availability of this service may vary by country, adding an extra degree of confidence for those worried about data security. The Seagate FireCuda 530 500GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Gaming SSD is a triumphant marriage of speed, storage capacity, and endurance, making it an excellent choice for enthusiasts and professionals looking for unrivaled performance from their storage solutions. Improve your computing experience with this SSD, which not only guarantees unrivaled performance but also dependability and lifespan under demanding workloads.

We have a large collection of the latest Seagate SSD to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. This 500GB SSD is compatible with Windows 10, 8.1, and Unix and features a SATA III 6 Gb/s interface, a 2.5" / 7mm form factor, sustained sequential read rates of up to 560 MB/s, and sustained sequential write speeds of up to 540 MB/s. Utilize an E16 controller which is fully aligned with AMD X570 chipset motherboards and able to reach up to read speeds up to 5000 MB/s and write speeds up to 2500 MB/s. This SSD also featured is a Total Bytes Written (TBT) of 850TB and an MTBF rating of 1.8 million hours. The Seagate BarraCuda Q5 1TB NVMe M.2 SSD provides up to 50x quicker performance than traditional hard drives. With its 3D QLC NAND technology and M.2 2280 form size, this SSD provides up to 50x quicker performance than standard hard drives. It employs the PCIe 3.0 x4 / NVMe 1.3 interface, which ensures consistent and efficient data transfer rates. The Seagate BarraCuda Q5 SSD features exceptional sequential read and writes speeds of up to 2400 MB/s, making it suitable for demanding applications like gaming, video editing, and content production. This SSD has a total bytes written (TBW) capacity of 274TB, indicating that it can handle large quantities of data. It has SMART and TRIM support to assure the SSD's health and performance, which helps to maximize the drive's performance and avoid data loss. As an added benefit, Seagate gives the free SeaTools SSD software program to monitor the drive's performance, health, and firmware upgrades.
